rules.name: announceAdvancements
extras: Whether advancements should be announced in chat

rules.name: commandBlockOutput
extras: Whether command blocks should notify admins when they perform commands

rules.name: disableElytraMovementCheck
extras: Whether the server should skip checking player speed when the player is wearing elytra. Often helps with jittering due to lag in multiplayer

rules.name: disableRaids
extras: Whether raids are disabled

rules.name: doDaylightCycle
extras: Whether the daylight cycle and moon phases progress

rules.name: doEntityDrops
extras: Controls drops from minecarts (including inventories), item frames, boats, etc.

rules.name: doFireTick
extras: Whether fire should spread and naturally extinguish

rules.name: doLimitedCrafting
extras: If enabled, players will be able to craft only unlocked recipes

rules.name: doMobLoot
extras: Controls resource drops from mobs, including experience orbs

rules.name: doMobSpawning
extras: Some entities might have seperate rules. Does not affect monster spawners

rules.name: doTileDrops
extras: Controls resource drops from blocks, including experience orbs

rules.name: doWeatherCycle
extras: Whether the weather can change naturally. The `/weather` command can still change weather

rules.name: keepInventory
extras: Whether the player should keep items and experience in their inventory after death

rules.name: logAdminCommands
extras: Whether to log admin commands to server log

rules.name: maxCommandChainLength
extras: The maximum length of a chain of commands that can be executed during one tick. Applies to command blocks and functions

rules.name: maxEntityCramming
extras: The maximum number of pushable entities a mob or player can push, before taking 3 suffocation damage per half-second.
Setting to 0 or lower disables the rule.
Damage affects survival-mode or adventure-mode players, and all mobs but bats. Pushable entities include non-spectator-mode players, any mob except bats, as well as boats and minecarts.

rules.name: mobGriefing
extras: Whether creepers, zombies, endermen, ghasts, withers, ender dragons, rabbits, sheep, villagers, silverfish, snow golems, and end crystals should be able to change blocks and whether mobs can pick up items, which also disables bartering
This also affects the capability of zombie-like creatures like zombified piglins and drowned to pathfind to turtle eggs

rules.name: naturalRegeneration
extras: Whether the player can regenerate health naturally if their hunger is full enough
Doesn't affect external healing, such as golden apples, the Regeneration effect, etc.

rules.name: randomTickSpeed
extras: How often a random block tick occurs (such as plant growth, leaf decay, etc.) per chunk section per game tick
0 and negative values disables random ticks, higher numbers increase random ticks
Setting to a high integer results in high speeds of decay and growth
Numbers over 4096 make plant growth or leaf decay instantaneous

rules.name: reducedDebugInfo
extras: Limits contents of debug screen

rules.name: sendCommandFeedback
extras: Whether the feedback from commands executed by a player should show up in chat
Also affects the default behavior of whether command blocks store their output text

rules.name: showDeathMessages
extras: Whether death messages are put into chat when a player dies
Also affects whether a message is sent to the pet's owner when the pet dies

rules.name: spawnRadius
extras: The number of blocks outward from the world spawn coordinates that a player spawns in when first joining a server or when dying without a personal spawnpoint

rules.name: spectatorsGenerateChunks
extras: Whether players in spectator mode can generate chunks
